Number one, Jetty is an AI health companion for people with chronic illness. It calls you daily, you just talk and tracks your symptoms and finds your triggers automatically. Number three, Keep Mind turns your notes and documents into flashcards, quizzes, and mind maps instantly. It uses smart spaced repetition so you study less but remember more.
